verses.roman:
gauḍa-nikaṭa āsite nāhi mora prayojana
tomā-duṅhā dekhite mora ihāṅ āgamana

synonyms: gauḍa-nikaṭa—to Bengal; āsite—to come; nāhi—there was none; mora—My; prayojana—necessity; tomā—you; duṅhā—two; dekhite—to see; mora—My; ihāṅ—here; āgamana—coming.
translation: "I really had no business in coming to Bengal, but I have come just to see you two brothers.
